channel.title: Midrash Aggadah
channel.description: A comprehensive resource for exploring midrash aggadah, featuring shiurim, source texts, and sefarim
channel.itunes:author: Midrash Aggadah
channel.itunes:summary: A comprehensive resource for exploring midrash aggadah, featuring shiurim, source texts, and sefarim

item.title: Yevamot 13a - Beit Hillel and Beit Shammai practiced love and friendship with one another
item.description: A shiur on "Yevamot 13a - Beit Hillel and Beit Shammai practiced love and friendship with one another" from Yevamot in the Ein Yaakov collection. Hebrew title: יבמות יג. - ללמדך שחיבה ורעות נוהגים זה בזה. Part of the comprehensive Midrash Aggadah learning series featuring classical Jewish wisdom and aggadic texts.

item.title: Yevamot 14a - Beit Shammai were of sharper intellect than Beit Hillel

item.title: Yevamot 16a - With heaven and earth as my witnesses, Hagai the prophet sat on this very mortar
item.description: A shiur on "Yevamot 16a - With heaven and earth as my witnesses, Hagai the prophet sat on this very mortar" from Yevamot in the Ein Yaakov collection. Hebrew title: יבמות טז. - מעיד אני עלי שמים וארץ שעל מדוכה זו ישב חגי הנביא. Part of the comprehensive Midrash Aggadah learning series featuring classical Jewish wisdom and aggadic texts.
